Description: Review the client's Veeam backups for issues
Review the Active Directory enviornment for issues via  repadmin, dcdiag. Review admin group memberships for unauthrized members
Review the operation of the client's server post update
Review the client's Office 365 portal for licensing or other issues
Review the Azure portal for issues.
Review the client's windows server application and security logs for standout issues
Update vCenter to the latest patch for the currently installed version
Take a backup of the hypervisor configuration and store the data in ITG, attach to the appropriate client device

Summary: Test File Level Restore from Backup (Veeam)
Description: Perform a file level restore utilizing the client's Veeam backups
Update the iLO firmware on the cleint's servers
Update the firmware on the client's NAS device(s)
Install the latest ESXi patch for the currently installed version
Install the reccommended firewall firmware

Summary: Update SQL Server - Service Packs, Update Rollups
Description: Install the latest SQL service pack
Work with the account's vCIO or primary engineer to review the configuration of the client's backup jobs. Ensure that the configuraiton is still optimal for the client's environment
Update the firmware on the client's servers - For  HP servers check for a model specific BIOS update that may have been released after the latest ISO/
Update the firmware on the client's switches
Update the firmware on the client's router(s)
Update the firmware on the web controller of the client's UPS(s)
Work with the account's vCIO or primary engineer to review the configuration of the client's Group policies. Ensure that the configuraiton is still optimal for the client's environment.
Install the latest version of Veeam Backup and Replication
Before a DR failover test or execute the client's DR Test
Perform an audit of the client's switch configuration for issues
Utilizing Auvik, review the client's network for issues. Ensure all infrastructure devices are SNMP \ login integrated. Ensure that all devices classified appropraitely.
Review the patch approval policies. Ensure all servers and workstations that are supposed to be automatically patched are (by being in the correct patch groups)
Update the firmware on the client's access points
